Markets

Markets

Transcending Markets

We leverage our advanced microencapsulation and enteric coating technologies to transcend the pharmaceutical landscape, allowing us to capitalize on both established and burgeoning drug markets with enhanced efficacy and patient experience

Microencapsulation

A precision technique where active ingredients are encased in a polymer matrix, creating particles ranging from sub-microns to millimeters

Enteric Coating

Our proprietary coating technology strategically delivers medication to the intestine, bypassing stomach degradation

Phase One, Target Markets

We are strategically positioned within the pharmaceutical industry by targeting well-established and rapidly expanding markets

Set to rapidly gain market share by surpassing current options in effectiveness and ease of use, our initial focus is diabetes, weight control, sexual health, and neurocare markets.

With a suite of groundbreaking products already navigating the regulatory approval pipeline, Altanine is poised to set new standards in healthcare delivery and patient outcomes.

8.5% CAGR

The erectile dysfunction market is expected to reach $4.73Bn by 2023

Driving factors include rising geriatric population, and a correlation between erectile dysfunction and diseases like diabetes and heart disease.
